LEASE AGREEMENT

Flat 259, Connaught Square Building
259 Connaught Square, London W2 2HL

This Lease is made on 1st January 1999

BETWEEN:
(1) CONNAUGHT SQUARE MANAGEMENT LIMITED (the "Landlord")
(2) JOHN SMITH and MARY SMITH (the "Tenants")

Term: 125 years from the date hereof

Ground Rent: ONE PEPPERCORN (if demanded)

The property demised comprises Flat 259 on the second floor of the Building known as Connaught Square, London W2 2HL.

Signed and delivered this 1st January 1999
